statements: SELECT * FROM VehicleDetails;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM VehicleDetails WHERE vehicle_year > 2015;
SELECT vehicle_type, vehicle_make, vehicle_year FROM VehicleDetails WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_model FROM VehicleDetails WHERE vehicle_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2015 ORDER BY vehicle_model DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, vehicle_type FROM VehicleDetails WHERE vehicle_type LIKE '%SUV%' ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM VehicleDetails WHERE vehicle_year > 2015 ORDER BY vehicle_make DESC
SELECT * FROM VehicleDetails WHERE vehicle_type = 'Sedan' AND vehicle_year BETWEEN 2016 AND 2020
SELECT DISTINCT vehicle_make, COUNT(vehicle_type) AS total_count FROM VehicleDetails GROUP BY vehicle_make HAVING total_count > 1 ORDER BY total_count DESC
SELECT vehicle_type, COUNT(*) AS total_vehicles FROM VehicleDetails GROUP BY vehicle_type ORDER BY total_vehicles DESC
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM VehicleDetails WHERE vehicle_make LIKE '%Toyota%'
SELECT * FROM vehicles ORDER BY year DESC, make ASC
SELECT make, model, color FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2015
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE color = 'Red'
SELECT * FROM accident_reports WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY accident_date DESC
SELECT description FROM accident_reports WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND accident_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT make, model, year, color FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY make ASC, year DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicles WHERE color = 'Red' AND make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, make, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY year DESC;
SELECT * FROM accident_reports JOIN vehicles ON accident_reports.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id WHERE accident_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT make, COUNT(vehicle_id) AS total_accidents FROM vehicles JOIN accident_reports ON vehicles.vehicle_id = accident_reports.vehicle_id GROUP BY make;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_details LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM vehicle_details WHERE vehicle_year > 2015;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_owner FROM vehicle_details WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT report_id, accident_date, accident_description FROM accident_reports ORDER BY accident_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_status, claim_amount FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_details WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM vehicle_details ORDER BY vehicle_year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_owner FROM vehicle_details WHERE vehicle_year > 2010 AND vehicle_id IN (SELECT vehicle_id FROM accident_reports WHERE accident_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01');
SELECT claim_status, claim_amount FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_amount > 5000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT vd.vehicle_make, ar.accident_description, cp.claim_status FROM vehicle_details vd JOIN accident_reports ar ON vd.vehicle_id = ar.vehicle_id JOIN claims_processing cp ON ar.report_id = cp.report_id WHERE vd.vehicle_make = 'Ford' AND cp.claim_amount < 1000 ORDER BY ar.accident_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle_Details ORDER BY vehicle_year DESC, vehicle_color ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model FROM Vehicle_Details WHERE vehicle_make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle_Details WHERE vehicle_color IN ('Red', 'Blue', 'Black') AND vehicle_year > 2015 ORDER BY vehicle_make ASC;
SELECT claim_id, claim_amount, claim_status FROM Claims_Processing WHERE claim_amount > 5000.00 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_type FROM Users WHERE user_type = 'Admin' OR user_type = 'Manager' ORDER BY user_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_type = 'Admin';
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_color FROM Vehicle_Details WHERE vehicle_year > 2015 ORDER BY vehicle_make ASC;
SELECT vehicle_make, vehicle_model, vehicle_year FROM Vehicle_Details WHERE vehicle_color = 'Red' ORDER BY vehicle_year DESC;

SELECT Users.user_name, Claims_Processing.claim_amount, Accident_Reports.accident_date FROM Users INNER JOIN Claims_Processing ON Users.user_id = Claims_Processing.report_id INNER JOIN Accident_Reports ON Claims_Processing.report_id = Accident_Reports.report_id;
SELECT DISTINCT Users.user_name, Claims_Processing.claim_status FROM Users JOIN Claims_Processing ON Users.user_id = Claims_Processing.report_id WHERE Claims_Processing.claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE brand='Toyota';
SELECT vehicle_id, brand, color FROM vehicles ORDER BY color ASC;
SELECT accident_id, accident_date, description FROM accidents WHERE accident_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT company_name, contact_person FROM insurance_companies WHERE phone_number LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM vehicles;
SELECT brand, model, year FROM vehicles WHERE year > 2010;
SELECT * FROM accidents JOIN vehicles ON accidents.vehicle_id = vehicles.vehicle_id;
SELECT company_name, contact_person, phone_number FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT claim_amount, status FROM claims JOIN accidents ON claims.accident_id = accidents.accident_id;
